title: Character in a list of strings

content.description: Assume that both lists and strings are indexed starting with index 1.
content.question: The list wordList has the following contents.["abc", "def", "ghi", "jkl"]Let myWord be the element at index 3 of wordList. Let myChar be the character at index 2 of myWord. What is the value of myChar ?

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Generalize data sources through variables.
